text: Khwina is a 2016 Indian Bodo language action romantic film written, directed by Phaylaw Basumatary and produced by Dwimu Film Production Presents. The film stars Jirina Brahma in the title role, Omprakash Kherkatary, Simang Chainary and Helina Daimary in leading roles. Jesus Kherkatary is the negative role in the film. The film was released in 2016."खैना सावथुन: बिनि मेथाइफोर" Retrieved 30 April 2017"Bodo film KHWINA trailer" Youtube, Retrieved 30 April 2017 Khwina was awarded the Best Film Award for 2016, in the 2nd Bodo Film Festival held at Dimakuchi, Udalguri district on 29 April 2017."Bodo Film Festival Awards 2017" ==Plot== The film tells a story about deforestation. Director and producer claimed that they made the film to aware people against ruthless deforestation. The story of Khwina takes place in Manas National Park. ==Cast== * Omprakash Kherkatary as Orgeng * Jirina Brahma as Khwina * Simang Chainary as Aron Khungur Brahma (Aron) * Helina Daimary as Dodere *Jesus Kherkatary as Gobda * Phaylaw Basumatary as Jabrang ==Soundtrack== The music of the film is composed by Phaylaw Basumatary and lyrics by himself. The songs in this film are sung by popular singers like Zubeen Garg, Sulekha Basumatary, Sujuma Daimary and Gitashree Ramchiary. The album contains 5 tracks. ==Awards== {|class= "wikitable" sortable" |- !Award !Category !Winner's name !Result |- |rowspan= "3"|2nd Bodo Film Festival 2017 |Best Film- |Phaylaw Basumatary | |- |Best Actor- Male |Omprakash Kherkatary | \- |Best Villain- Male |Jesus Kherkatary | |} ==See also== * Bodo films ==References== Category:2016 films Category:Indian films Category:Indian romantic action films Category:2010s romantic action films
title: Khwina
